text: Windows for Pen Computing is a software suite by Microsoft. It was made for Windows 3.1x and designed to add pen computing abilities to the Windows operating environment. It was the second major pen computing platform for x86 tablet PCs. The first major pen computing platform was GO Corporation's PenPoint OS. Microsoft first released Windows for Pen Computing in 1992."Pen Computing and Windows 95" == References == Category:Microsoft operating systems
title: Windows for Pen Computing
